item.title: Binance Alpha's new Sidekick(K) launchpad opened with an approximate initial return of $92.5
item.description: On August 8th, based on market data, Sidekick (K) has been listed on Binance Alpha. It is currently trading at $0.37 and has a market capitalization of $41 million. Each eligible user can receive an airdrop of 250 K tokens. The estimated airdrop value per person is approximately $92.50 according to the current price.

item.title: OKX is now integrated with Apple Pay, supporting one-click coin purchases for users in the United States and Europe.
item.description: August 8th. According to official sources, the CEO of OKX, Star, retweeted the message "Apple Pay has now landed on the OKX European site" on the X platform and stated: "This is a significant step towards the adoption of cryptocurrencies. Apple Pay has been fully integrated into the buy-crypto process on the OKX platform, enabling users in the United States and the European Economic Area (EEA) to make one-click coin purchases without the need to enter bank card information. OKX is making the crypto world simpler, more accessible, and truly mainstream."

item.title: Bitget Launches Sidekick (K) Spot Trading
item.description: August 8th. Bitget has launched Sidekick (K) in the Innovation Zone. The trading channel is now available, and the withdrawal channel will open at 18:00 on August 8th (UTC+8).

item.title: Bybit will launch the Sidekick(K) U-based Perpetual Contract
item.description: August 8th. Bybit is set to launch the Sidekick (K)U Coin-margined Perpetual Contract.

item.title: Binance Alpha will launch SatLayer (SLAY) on August 11.
item.description: On August 8th, Binance Alpha is set to launch SatLayer (SLAY) on August 11th. Users who are eligible can access the Alpha event page and claim the airdrop by using points once the Alpha trading commences. Specific details will be provided separately.

item.title: Moonbirds 7-Day Price Change Reaches 17.76%, Floor Price Surpasses 2.5 ETH
item.description: On August 8th, according to Blur Data, Moonbirds witnessed a 17.76% growth in the past 7 days. The floor price exceeded 2.5 ETH, with a 24-hour increase of 10.81% and a 24-hour trading volume of 146.65 ETH.

item.title: A "Alpha Attack Speed Build" whale address recently spent $90,000 sniping the PROVE listing, making a $6,517 profit
item.description: August 8th. According to on-chain analyst Ai Auntie (@ai_9684xtpa), a particular "Alpha Raid Speed" smart money address has been constantly implementing the "sniper opening and buy low, sell high" strategy. In a recent transaction, they used $90,000 to snipe the opening price of PROVE and achieved a profit of $6,517.According to statistics, Binance Alpha has recently shifted some newly listed tokens from the "opening price drop" mode to the "stable" or even "opening low and rising high" mode. Among the latest 5 listed tokens, four have not witnessed a price drop within the first 24 hours. The token listed the day before yesterday, IN, has seen a 65% price increase in the past 24 hours, making it the best-performing Alpha new coin recently.

item.title: Binance Completes GUNZ (GUN) Integration on the Solana Network
item.description: August 8, according to an official communication, Binance has accomplished the integration of GUNZ (GUN) on the Solana network and has currently initiated the deposit and withdrawal services.

item.title: DDC Enterprise is pleased to announce a partnership with Galaxy Digital.
item.description: On August 8th, DDC Enterprise Limited (with the New York Stock Exchange symbol: DDC) declared a partnership with Galaxy Digital in order to enhance its corporate Bitcoin treasury management. Galaxy's institutional trading services and infrastructure will be incorporated into DDC's operations, offering deeper liquidity, secure execution, and regulated custody for DDC's digital asset reserves.Previously on July 1st, DDC Enterprise (NYSE: DDC) announced the accomplishment of a $528 million financing plan. The investors consist of Anson Funds, Animoca Brands, Kenetic Capital, QCP Capital, and others. The raised funds will be utilized to expand its Bitcoin reserves.

item.title: Bybit Web3 has been newly revamped and launched, making on-chain transactions more convenient.
item.description: August 8th. Bybit announced the official launch of the new version of Web3. It enables users to directly trade on-chain assets on the Bybit main site through a Unified Trading Account (UTA). There is no need to connect a wallet, create a Web3 wallet, or recharge Gas tokens. Bybit Web3 serves as a bridge between CEX and DEX, providing users with a more convenient, secure, and seamless on-chain asset exploration and trading experience.Currently, Bybit Web3 supports popular tokens such as TUNA, PUMP, FRAG, Fartcoin, JLP, RAY, MOODENG, LetsBONK, TSLAx, MSTRx, SPYx, CRCLx, and NVDAx.
